title: A Year Later: Did the Clippers Win the Blake Griffin Trade? | Heat Check (Ep. 368)
description:
The Los Angeles Clippers host Blake Griffin for the first time since the controversial trade (3:27), the Boston Celtics falter despite their talent (15:26), the New York Knicks accelerate their tank (28:08), and rookies’ statistical comparisons encourage or discourage fans (49:32).

Host: John Gonzalez
Guests: Joe House, Dan Devine, Zach Kram

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
